name: 工程數學（二）
goals: Realize theoretical concepts, professional terminologies and solve problems of engineering mathematics.
syllabus:
Week 1           : Introduction

Week 2-3       : Linear Algebra: Matrix calculation (multiplication, inversion)

Week 4-5       : Linear Algebra: Rank and Dependency

Week 6          : Numerical Analysis: Iterative Method

Week 7          : Midterm examination

Week 8-10   : Numerical Analysis: Interpolation

Week 11-12   : Graph Theory: Introduction

Week 13        :  Graph Theory: Application

Week 14         : Final examination

Week 15-16         : Final report

Flexible teaching methods: self-directed and digital learning

methodologies.note: Powerpoint slides based on the reference books

grading.note: Each group will give final presentations that introduce the applications of EM in EE domain
